dependencies: apache-flink==1.17.0 (installed in images/pyflink.Dockerfile via `pip install apache-flink==${FLINK_VERSION}`)
Flink SQL Kafka connector JAR (downloaded in images/pyflink.Dockerfile: flink-sql-connector-kafka-1.17.0.jar)
Flink SQL Avro Confluent Registry connector JAR (downloaded in images/pyflink.Dockerfile: flink-sql-avro-confluent-registry-1.17.0.jar)
deployment_relevant_files: src/flink-sql-connector-kafka-1.15.2.jar (present in repo; runtime uses 1.17.0 jars per images/pyflink.Dockerfile)
architectural_resources: Apache Flink cluster (JobManager/TaskManager or Flink Kubernetes Operator session cluster)
Kubernetes Ingress (for Flink UI and Kafka Connect REST access, depending on manifests)

projects.project_directory: images/kafka-connect.Dockerfile (Kafka Connect image build context at repo root)
dependencies: init_connector.sh (copied and used as ENTRYPOINT in images/kafka-connect.Dockerfile)
architectural_resources: Schema Registry dependency (AvroConverter configured in docker-compose.yml and infra/k8s/connect-deployment.yaml)
S3-compatible object storage target implied by kafka-connect-s3 plugin (docker-compose uses localstack as S3 emulator)
Ingress route `/connect` to Kafka Connect REST (infra/k8s/ingress.yaml)

dependencies: Confluent Platform images referenced by manifests (e.g., broker/zookeeper/schema-registry/connect deployments; see infra/k8s/*-deployment.yaml)
NGINX Ingress Controller annotations (infra/k8s/ingress.yaml and infra/k8s/flink-deployment.yml ingress template/annotations)
architectural_resources: Kubernetes cluster (kind per README, though no *.tf found in this repo snapshot)
Cross-namespace service discovery via ExternalName services (kafka-external-name.yaml, schema-registry-external-name.yaml)

dependencies: Custom images: kafka-connect (built from images/kafka-connect.Dockerfile), pyflink (built from images/pyflink.Dockerfile)
architectural_resources: Kafka Connect (with datagen + S3 sink plugins)
PostgreSQL database (Debezium example image; CDC use-case implied)
